thread.title: Appetizer Mobile Announces Joint Venture Partnership With U
thread.title_full: Appetizer Mobile Announces Joint Venture Partnership With U

author: Ubiquity, Inc.
title: Appetizer Mobile Announces Joint Venture Partnership With U
text:
NEW YORK , Oct. Appetizer Mobile , the leading mobile app development agency in New York City , and Ubiquity, Inc. (OTCQB: UBIQ) ("Ubiquity") an Irvine, California based technology development and licensing company that holds an extensive portfolio of patents, are proud to announce a joint venture partnership to develop innovative, next generation technologies. Jordan Edelson , CEO and Founder of Appetizer Mobile will join forces with Chris Carmichael , Chairman, CEO and Co-Founder of Ubiquity, to leverage both enterprises' myriad mobile and technology patents. Edelson will spearhead the strategic partnership by assessing market needs and co-developing the technical software required to bring complex ideas to market.
"Teaming up with Ubiquity is a logical next step for Appetizer Mobile as we continue to evolve and create new developments in the technology landscape," stated Edelson. "I look forward to partnering with Chris, and I believe our combined strengths will allow us to revolutionize the consumer experience with state-of-the-art products and mobile services."
Both companies, regarded for their position on the forefront of new innovation, will work together to develop groundbreaking products, with an initial focus on Ubiquity's signature product, the "Sprocket." Collectively, their creative process will encapsulate artificial intelligence, augmented and virtual reality, streaming content, biometrics, social mobility and transactional platforms for e-commerce, utilizing the Sprocket.
"I am excited to be working with Appetizer Mobile, under the helm of Jordan Edelson ," stated Chris Carmichael , Chairman, CEO and Co-Founder of Ubiquity. "Jordan and I share a likeminded vision for capturing the needs of the market place and delivering those needs in a groundbreaking way. Jordan has established an uncanny ability to identify business opportunities with a keen sense on how to market and drive revenue, and I look forward to working alongside him."
About Appetizer Mobile:
Appetizer Mobile is a full-service creative mobile application development, consulting and marketing company, founded by Jordan Edelson , who was recognized as one of Forbes Magazine's 2015 "30 Under 30." Named one of the top ten mobile app developers in the United States for four consecutive years, Appetizer Mobile has developed hundreds of mobile apps and digital experiences for leading global brands and celebrities, including: Lady Gaga, Kim Kardashian , NBA Properties, Epic Records, Joe Girardi , Montessorium and Interscope Records, to name a few. Under Edelson's leadership, Appetizer Mobile has been recognized globally as a firm with the expertise to create innovative brand identity for clients, with an emphasized focus on the mobile space. Appetizer Mobile is on the forefront of the mobile technology industry, having developed a wide range of innovative applications that range from educational and social networking to B2B enterprise, secure communications and games. Currently Appetizer Mobile is ranked among the top mobile application development companies in the world.
For more information, please visit www.AppetizerMobile.com .
About Ubiquity, Inc.:
Based in Irvine, CA , Ubiquity is a vertically integrated, technology-focused media company. Ubiquity is focused in five specific areas with a robust portfolio of patents and intellectual property. The Company has developed an intuitive user interface making access to all content from any device in a simple, consistent format, has enabled the search and identification of any object and image in all video and digital media, and has developed a platform for mobile transaction including the integration of payments, money transfers, coupons and gifts. The Sprocket is an industry-leading, intuitive, immersive consumer experience for all web-based activity, and allows for the personalization of all content, whether public or private, in a unique, accessible way.
Ubiquity is leveraging an extensive portfolio of intellectual property spanning, immersive advertising, video compression, content distribution, eCommerce, mobile and wearable applications to support the commercialization of new technologies. In addition, we intend to pursue strategic licensing opportunities.
To download Ubiquity's investor relations app, which offers access to SEC documents, press releases, videos, audiocasts and more, please click to download from your iPhone or iPad or Android device .
